revised_title: Field Experiments in Salt Formations for Radioactive Waste Disposal
tldr: This article discusses the history and objectives of field experiments in salt formations for the disposal of radioactive waste. It highlights major experiments conducted in rock salt formations, focusing on the development and testing of disposal techniques, procurement of data for repository design, and investigation of long-term behavior and performance assessment. The article also covers the different types of radioactive wastes, disposal techniques, and in-situ investigations for shut-down and sealing of repositories.
